blogPost.excerpt: Crucial Human Theme is a VSCode IDE dark theme dressed in royal purple and designed to keep you focused. Click "Get It" to install it from the Visual Studio Marketplace or simply search for "Crucial Human" from inside VSCode -> Extensions.
blogPost.body: Crucial Human Theme is a VSCode IDE dark theme dressed in royal purple and designed to keep you focused. Click "Get It" to install it from the Visual Studio Marketplace or simply search for "Crucial Human" from inside VSCode -> Extensions.
blogPost.title: Crucial Human Theme for VSCode - A royal dark theme for VSCode
blogPost.author: Eddie Hermoso

localize.description: Crucial Human Theme是一款VSCode IDE的深色主题，身着皇家紫色的服装，旨在让你专注于此。点击 "Get It "从Visual Studio Marketplace安装它，或者只需在VSCode -> Extensions中搜索 "Crucial Human"。
Crucial Human Theme是一款VSCode IDE的深色主題，身着皇家紫色的服裝，旨在讓你專注於此。點擊 "Get It "從Visual Studio Marketplace安裝它，或者只需在VSCode -> Extensions中搜索 "Crucial Human"。

previous.excerpt: Ever used Netflix party or Prime party with friends. Well here is an application to watch locally downloaded videos.
previous.title: Video Party - Watch videos together

localize.description: 曾经使用Netflix党或Prime党与朋友。那么这里有一个应用程序来观看本地下载的视频。
曾經使用Netflix黨或Prime黨與朋友。那麼這裏有一個應用程序來觀看本地下載的視頻。
